{{About|the eremite sentry in the entrance to [[Bayt Al-Muazzam]]|the other Eremite Sentries|Eremite Sentry}}
'''Eremite Sentry''' is an open-world [[NPC]] located in [[Desert of Hadramaveth]], [[Sumeru]] encountered after completing {{Quest|Dune-Entombed Fecundity: Part III}}. He is part of the [[Tanit]] tribe.

He guards the entrance to [[Bayt Al-Muazzam]], an entrance leading to the [[Eternal Oasis]].

After completing ''[[For Her Judgment Reaches to the Skies...]]'', the sentry will disappear from his post. In his place is a non-respawning Eremite enemy group.{{verify}}

==Profile==
The Eremite Sentry was ordered by Matriarch [[Babel]] to guard the entrances to two places leading to the Eternal Oasis.

===Appearance===
The Eremite Sentry takes on the appearance of an [[Eremite Linebreaker]] enemy.
